mapper.select: select orderid, customerid, createdate as "createDateTime", payDate as "payDateTime", deliveryDate as "deliveryDateTime", billname, billpro, billcity, billdis as "billDistrict", billaddr, totalprice, shippingcost, paymethod, note, status from orders,orderstatus where orders.orderid = orderstatus.orderid order by createdate

select orders.orderid, customerid, linenum as lineNum, createdate as createDateTime, payDate as payDateTime, deliveryDate as deliveryDateTime, billname, billpro, billcity, billdis as billDistrict, billaddr, totalprice, shippingcost, paymethod, note, paystatus, processstatus from orders,orderstatus where orders.orderid = orderstatus.orderid and orders.orderid = #{orderId} order by createdate
mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderid, customerid, createdate, paydate, deliverydate,billname,billpro,billcity,billdis, billaddr, totalprice, shippingcost, paymethod, note) values (#{orderId}, #{customerId}, #{createDateTime}, #{payDateTime}, #{deliveryDateTime}, #{billName}, #{billPro}, #{billCity}, #{billDistrict}, #{billAddr}, #{totalPrice}, #{shippingCost}, #{payMethod},#{note})
insert into orderstatus (orderid, linenum, createtime, paystatus, processstatus) values (#{orderId}, #{lineNum}, #{createDateTime}, #{payStatus}, #{processStatus})
